summary: TAKATA RECALL I WAS NOTIFIED OF A RECALL ON MY VEHICLE FOR THE PASSENGER AIRBAG (TAKATA), AND WAS TOLD A SOLUTION IS PENDING. IT HAS BEEN OVER A YEAR SINCE I WAS NOTIFIED AND A SOLUTION IS STILL PENDING. NO FURTHER UPDATES OR INFORMATION ABOUT A REMEDY FOR THIS RECALL HAS BEEN PROVIDED OR IS AVAILABLE. NHTSA RECALL NUMBER: 16V382
